content: the macy dishcloth crochet pattern features a gorgeous solid texture on both sides that is both pretty and practical if you have been around rich textures crochet for a bit you will know that i love crocheting washcloths and dishcloths they are a great small project that you can work in between larger projects or alongside larger projects if you enjoy working multiple patterns at once the macy dishcloth pattern is created by working row of basic crochet stitches in front and then by working small cluster stitches in behind as a result the crochet dishcloth is fairly thick with a great texture it s holds up well to multiple uses this crochet pattern is available in english only and written in american crochet terms a free written copy of this pattern can be found on my ad supported website https //richtexturescrochet com a free video tutorial for this pattern can be found on my youtube channel https //www youtube com/c/richtexturescrochet/ skill level easy gauge 16 stitches x 16 row of half_double_crochet = 4 inches finished size approximately 8 x 8 inches yarn pima cotton by lion brand® 186 yds/170 m 100g/3 5 oz 100% cotton 4 worsted weight you will need approximately 100 yards per dishcloth hook size h/8 5 mm hook notions yarn needle
